FR EN

Revealing the invisible, freezing the essential

A holistic approach mixing the presence of the gaze and the depth of the breath.

My Vision

I have always been driven by a quest for meaning and harmony. My journey has led me to explore two worlds which, although different in appearance, join in the same quest: that of presence. Through my lens or during my therapy sessions, I accompany you to find this deep connection with yourself and with the world around you.

Photography

Capturing the Soul

Photography is for me much more than a simple image capture. It is an act of radical presence. My goal is to freeze these moments of grace, these bursts of truth where your natural light is revealed without artifice. Whether celebrating love or witnessing a moment of life, I strive to create images that resonate and span time.

View Portfolio

Holistic Therapy

The Inner Journey

Accompanying humans in their fulfillment is at the heart of my practice. Through breathwork and a holistic approach, I help you release blockages, soothe the mind and regain your inner power. Each session is a safe and benevolent space dedicated to your personal transformation.

My Services

My Committed Values

Authenticity

Being true, without a mask, to allow a sincere meeting with oneself and with others.

Presence

Knowing how to listen to silence and capture the present moment, where it all begins.

Harmony

Finding the balance between the body, the mind and the image we project.

Simon Gindre
Playa Del Carmen, Mexico
